title: Calories in Short Ribs
meta_description: Discover calories in short ribs per 100g serving, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for braised beef short ribs.
assumptions: Beef short ribs, braised, trimmed of excess fat, bone-in but values for meat portion only; no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, cooking method, fat trimming, and beef grade. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100g of braised beef short ribs provides ~271 kcal and ~21g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Grilled instead of braised (less fat rendered)

faqs.q: How many calories in short ribs per 100g?
faqs.a: About 271 kcal for braised beef short ribs.

faqs.q: Are short ribs high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, ~21g protein per 100g, making them a good source for muscle building.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in short ribs?
faqs.a: Around 20g total fat per 100g, with 8.5g saturated.
No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain braised short ribs.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in short ribs?
faqs.a: Braising renders fat (lower calories); grilling or smoking can vary by added oils or marinades.
